title: Spicy Garlic Shrimp
description: Tender shrimp sauteed with garlic and spicy chili peppers.

title: Mushroom and Tofu Stir Fry
description: A vegetarian dish with savory mushrooms and tofu, stir-fried to perfection.

title: Beef and Broccoli
description: Thin slices of tender beef stir-fried with crisp broccoli in a savory sauce.

title: General Tso's Chicken
description: Crispy fried chicken in a sweet and spicy sauce, served with steamed rice.
